publicwhip.spmotion: *S2M-5537 Maureen Macmillan: Fatal Accident at Delny Level Crossing, Ross-shire—That the Parliament notes with grave concern the fatal accident which occurred at the Delny level crossing in Ross-shire on 2 February 2007; notes also the long standing concerns about the safety of the barrier-less crossings on the Far North and Kyle railway lines, and urges the Scottish Executive to consider how safety at these crossings could be improved.

S2M-5537 Fatal Accident at Delny Level Crossing, Ross-shire (lodged on 5 February 2007) Eleanor Scott*, Peter Peacock*, Mr Jamie Stone*, Mr Charlie Gordon*, Helen Eadie*, Robin Harper*, Marilyn Livingstone*, Trish Godman*, Nora Radcliffe*, Mr Kenneth Macintosh*, Mr Frank McAveety*, Dave Petrie*, Mr John Swinney*
S2M-5537 Fatal Accident at Delny Level Crossing, Ross-shire (lodged on 5 February 2007) Ms Rosemary Byrne*, Rosie Kane*
S2M-5537 Fatal Accident at Delny Level Crossing, Ross-shire (lodged on 5 February 2007) Dr Jean Turner*

S2M-5537 Maureen Macmillan: Fatal Accident at Delny Level Crossing, Ross-shire—That the Parliament notes with grave concern the fatal accident which occurred at the Delny level crossing in Ross-shire on 2 February 2007; notes also the long standing concerns about the safety of the barrier-less crossings on the Far North and Kyle railway lines, and urges the Scottish Executive to consider how safety at these crossings could be improved. Supported by: Eleanor Scott, Peter Peacock, Mr Jamie Stone, Mr Charlie Gordon, Helen Eadie, Robin Harper, Marilyn Livingstone, Trish Godman, Nora Radcliffe, Mr Kenneth Macintosh, Mr Frank McAveety, Dave Petrie, Mr John Swinney, Ms Rosemary Byrne, Rosie Kane, Dr Jean Turner
S2M-5537 Fatal Accident at Delny Level Crossing, Ross-shire (lodged on 5 February 2007) Tommy Sheridan*, Rob Gibson*, Michael McMahon*
S2M-5537 Fatal Accident at Delny Level Crossing, Ross-shire (lodged on 5 February 2007) Linda Fabiani*
S2M-5537 Fatal Accident at Delny Level Crossing, Ross-shire (lodged on 5 February 2007) Mr David Davidson*

S2M-5537 Maureen Macmillan: Fatal Accident at Delny Level Crossing, Ross-shire—That the Parliament notes with grave concern the fatal accident which occurred at the Delny level crossing in Ross-shire on 2 February 2007; notes also the long standing concerns about the safety of the barrier-less crossings on the Far North and Kyle railway lines, and urges the Scottish Executive to consider how safety at these crossings could be improved. Supported by: Eleanor Scott, Peter Peacock, Mr Jamie Stone, Mr Charlie Gordon, Helen Eadie, Robin Harper, Marilyn Livingstone, Trish Godman, Nora Radcliffe, Mr Kenneth Macintosh, Mr Frank McAveety, Dave Petrie, Mr John Swinney, Ms Rosemary Byrne, Rosie Kane, Dr Jean Turner, Tommy Sheridan, Rob Gibson, Michael McMahon, Linda Fabiani, Mr David Davidson
